entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers late this evening then 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Snow level 1700 metres lowering to valley bottom near midnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Sunday 16 April 2023
